name: tripos
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the examinations for a BA honours degree (= first university degree) at Cambridge University, consisting of two parts: She went to Newnham College, Cambridge, where she got a first in the natural sciences tripos. She read English for Part I of the Tripos, Archaeology and Anthropology for Part II.
More examplesFewer examplesShe gained third-class honours in the mathematical tripos in 1880.The award was traditionally given to the student at Cambridge University who came bottom in the mathematical tripos. From the Emmanuel College list he got some information about his father's matriculation and tripos results.
